snippet: Race-dependent availability of apartments was a pattern at a 107-unit building in Sunnyside, according to the Fair Housing Justice Center, a nonprofit group that filed a federal lawsuit on Wednesday.
abstract: Race-dependent availability of apartments was a pattern at a 107-unit building in Sunnyside, according to the Fair Housing Justice Center, a nonprofit group that filed a federal lawsuit on Wednesday.

headline.main: Lawsuit Claims Racial Discrimination at a Building in Sunnyside
